nodes.text: The Model AXM-50 "Blast and Smash", or Prax "Blast and Smash" Energy Rifle, was an over-under, twin-barreled weapon designed by Prax Arms. The AXM-50 combined a Drearian Defense Conglomerate rapid-fire blaster rifle with a modified Locris Syndicates micro-grenade launcher underneath. A bipod could be attached to increase accuracy.
